data.text:
Beyond Apollo (Orbit, 1975)

Malzberg, Barry

Softcover. Condition: Good. 1975. A fairly presentable copy, with some mild rubbing and fading around the outer edges of the covers from ordinary handling and storage, lightly browned outer page edges as common for these 70s editions, but internally clean throughout with no notable creases or signs of wear. Why on Amazon do most sellers not describe their actual book? Buy with confidence and support a genuine Independent Bricks & Mortar Real Bookshop. We are Maynard & Bradley CAMBO & PBFA(now lapsed) members here in Leicester City Centre. Size: 115 x 180 mm. 138. Item Type: Book. Quantity Available: 1. Shipped Weight: Under 500 grams. Category: Science Fiction & Fantasy; Britain/UK; 1970s; ISBN: 0860078728. ISBN/EAN: 9780860078722. Inventory No: 38021. Seller Inventory # 38021
